head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Prostitution Sentence

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Prostitution Sentence

body.head.byline: By COLIN MOYNIHAN; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Jason Itzler is sentenced to one and one-half years in prison in plea deal with Judge Daniel P FitzGerald in Manhattan; ran escort service, laundered money and attempted promotion of prostitution (S)

block.p: The operator of an escort service in TriBeCa was sentenced to a year and a half to three years in prison yesterday for money laundering and attempted promotion of prostitution. Judge Daniel P. FitzGerald sentenced the operator, Jason Itzler, 39, under the terms of a plea agreement. ''I've grown up, I've matured, I've learned a lot,'' Mr. Itzler, who once proclaimed himself to be ''King of all Pimps'' in an interview with New York magazine, told the court. ''I will never run an escort agency again.''
